title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM and chat interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chat, file upload, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Next.js chatbot template that connects to Ollama via the OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spins up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code and documentation using Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama models as Slack slash commands and DM bots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama models act as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter auto-configuring an Ollama REST client for Java backends.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated registry of Modelfile recipes for Phi-3, Zephyr, WizardLM, and more.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate on crates.io providing typed bindings to the Ollama API.
